summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3546 for the improvement of North 41st Street, from Eastern Avenue to Sunnyside Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43799, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
